name: Gateway Addon for Swish Payment for GiveWP
author: Proloy Bhaduri

sections.description:
This plugin will add new payment gateway for GiveWP donation plugin . People who have access to swish app can donate using Swish .

Features

  1. Seamless payment through Swish app in GiveWP
  2. Well maintained clean code
  3. Automatically redirect to donation confirmation or donation falied page based on payment status.

Configuration & Set up

  1. Generate password protected p12 file and upload to the server for production mode
  2. To use this plugin for production upload SwishCert.p12 file in the backend

Quick Notes & Links

  1. WordPress Tips and Tricks By Proloy Bhaduri
  2. Buy me a Coffee
sections.installation:
This section describes the way you can install the plugin

  • You can directly install the plugin from wordpress admin screen of your site Plugins > Add New and search For Gateway Addon for Swish Payment for GiveWP .
  • Alternatively you can download the plugin file from the WordPress.org and upload to your site via Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin
  • Click on Give > Settings > Payment Gateways > Swish to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Enhancement: Simplified logic and removed unwanted code

1.0.1

  • Fix: Certificate file path correction

1.0.0

  • Initial release
